content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why the Soviet Union supported movements such as the one described in the passage?

choices.label: The Soviets supported violent movements based on racial ideology.
The Soviets sought to aid movements that shared their religious ideology.
The Soviets believed that most colonized peoples were incapable of effective self-government.
The Soviets wished to undermine Western governments during the Cold War.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
